chapters.title: Mirror Lake Awakens
chapters.subtitle: Dawn at the water’s edge
chapters.papa: Patience, seeker. The lake reflects what you bring.
chapters.narration: The surface is still, breathing with mist. Somewhere beneath, a rhythm waits for your first cast.

chapters.title: The Willow’s Way
chapters.subtitle: Shade and listening
chapters.papa: Not all shadows hide danger. Some teach you to see.
chapters.narration: Under the willow, water slows. Follow the quiet. Name your intention before you cast.

chapters.title: The Hidden Bend
chapters.subtitle: Curving back toward patience
chapters.papa: The lake reveals the bend to those who listen.
chapters.narration: The bank curves gently. You feel the pull to slow down — to retrieve with care and release with gratitude.
